Book Dash volunteers are creative professionals who create high-quality children’s books that anyone can freely translate, print and distribute. This site hosts the plain HTML versions. Go to bookdash.org for PDFs and source files.

A Beautiful Day (English)

A Fish and a Gift (English, Zulu)

Sleepy Mr Sloth (English, Xhosa)

Get involved

On this site we host HTML versions of Book Dash books for use in ereaders and mobile-optimised websites.

  • You can reuse these books freely, as long as you credit the original creators and include a link to bookdash.org. If you reuse our books, we’d love to hear about it. You can let us know here.
  • You’ll soon be able to download epub versions from GitHub.
  • To contribute or raise issues about these versions, head over to our GitHub repo.
  • For a live overview of all our books, and what their production status is, see this Google Sheet.
  • For other ways to get involved, see bookdash.org.

Everything is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 licence.
